document.title: CHILDES wijnen corpus
document.intro: The corpus is based on home tapings of one Dutch boy, Niek, between the ages of 2;7 and 3;10. The recordings were made by Niek’s father (Frank Wijnen). The data were mainly used in a project focusing on the relation between language acquisition and developmental disfluency. The Wijnen Corpus was compiled by Frank Wijnen and Herma Veenhof-Haan. The corpus is based on home tapings of one Dutch boy, Niek, between the ages of 2;7 and 3;10. The recordings were made by Niek’s father (Frank Wijnen).
